response.original_title: ANEMONE／交響詩篇エウレカセブン ハイエボリューション
response.overview: After her father is killed by the deadly coral menace, Anemone vows to have her revenge. But the only way to fight back is from the inside.
response.title: Anemone: Eureka Seven Hi-Evolution
